Previous: Teacher's view Up: Views End of book

The student view will expand the basic elements by following student functions.

Dashboard

On the one hand you can see on this site all available courses, on the other hand you can see your courses additively.

At the bottom of the dashboard you see a list of students that are subscribed to the same courses as you.

Course

For every course you can see its survey. Moreover, if you are subscribed to that course, you are allowed to see the other subscribed students. You can unsubscribe by clicking the "leave this course" button. If you are not subscribed to the course, you can do so by clicking the button "join this course".

For every lesson of this course you can start and finish it. At this, you can have only one lesson in process at any given time. Besides you can only work on a lesson one after another.
